attributes.action: Reduce the salaries and expenses for all MPs to the level of an average public sector worker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish for the salaries and expenses of ministers to be set to a level which matches the average public sector worker. An easy way for Gordon Brown to raise his much needed funds and will give politicians an idea of what it is like to live on an average persons wage so they can more capably understands the requests of the general public.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
